plot: In a land of conformists, where all it's inhabitants wear the same mask, one man chooses to step outside. What will become of Soleil without the mask? Love? Life? Death?
title: Soleil
plot_es: In a land of conformists, where all it's inhabitants wear the same mask, one man chooses to step outside. What will become of Soleil without the mask? Love? Life? Death?
plot_en: In a land of conformists, where all it's inhabitants wear the same mask, one man chooses to step outside. What will become of Soleil without the mask? Love? Life? Death?
